Documentation
Table of Contents

Codeunit X509Certificate2

ID 1286
Namespace: System.Security.Encryption

Provides helper functions to work with the X509Certificate2 class.

Properties

Name Value
Access Public
InherentEntitlements X
InherentPermissions X

Methods

VerifyCertificate

Obsolete

This element will become obsolete from version 24.0. Use VerifyCertificate with SecretText data type for Password.

Verifes that a certificate is initialized and can be exported.

[NonDebuggable]
[Obsolete(Use VerifyCertificate with SecretText data type for Password.,24.0)]
procedure VerifyCertificate(var CertBase64Value: Text, Password: Text, X509ContentType: Enum "X509 Content Type"): Boolean

Parameters

Name Type Description
CertBase64Value Text

Represents the certificate value encoded using the Base64 algorithm
Password Text

Certificate Password
X509ContentType System.Security.Encryption."X509 Content Type"

Specifies the format of an X.509 certificate

Returns

Type Description
Boolean

True if certificate is verified

GetCertificateFriendlyName

Obsolete

This element will become obsolete from version 24.0. Use GetCertificateFriendlyName with SecretText data type for Password.

Specifies the friendly name of the certificate based on it's Base64 value.

[NonDebuggable]
[Obsolete(Use GetCertificateFriendlyName with SecretText data type for Password.,24.0)]
